content: you re going to fall in love with the christmas lane striped blanket crochet pattern this incredibly squishy and cozy blanket gives you something to snuggle with for the holiday season perfect for movie night opening gifts on christmas morning or relaxing with your favorite book make one for each of your kids and grandkids or the throw size as a family gift this christmas you can make these holiday colors or three favorite colors of yarn they are fast to make and you can whip up the kid size in about 5 hours which is great when you re short on time amid the busy holiday season these are also perfect when you want a mindless crochet blanket to make the stitch repeat combined with cozy yarn is relaxing and a perfect way to unwind after a busy day this pattern is also available for free on my blog the premium pdf also includes a color block chart for both sizes as well as directions to customize the size for your needs the christmas crochet blanket pattern uses mainly single_crochet stitches in the linen or moss stitch pattern to create a beautiful texture with no border needed dimensions -kids 36 x 40 91 44 cm x 101 6 cm -throw 50 x 60 127 0 cm x 152 4 cm materials needed size 6 super bulky weight yarn such as bernat blanket yarn -
